document.title: Hot Topic: Unclaimed Property Reporting Due May 1, 2002
document.abstract: Tennessee law regarding unclaimed property requires entities, including municipal governments, to file annual reports with the State of Tennessee Treasury Department by May 1 of each year for all tangible and intangible property that is presumed abandoned.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#80
